act:
1395962 THE PETROLEUM (BERAR EXTENSION) REPEAL ACT, 2002
ACT NO. 50 OF 2002 [ 27th November, 2002.]
An Act to repeal the Petroleum (Berar Extension) Act, 1937.
BE it enacted by Parliament in the Fifty- third Year of the Republic of India as follows:-
105454 1Short title.- This Act may be called the Petroleum (Berar Extension) Repeal Act, 2002.
610342 2Repeal of Act 23 of 1937.- The Petroleum (Berar Extension) Act, 1937, is hereby repealed. SUBHASH C. JAIN,
Secy. to the Govt. of India.
